subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Rafer Alston scored 22 points, Yao Ming added 16 points and 14 rebounds, and the Houston Rockets tied a team record Tuesday with their ninth road victory in a row, 93-85 over the Cleveland Cavaliers.
snippet: Rafer Alston scored 22 points, Yao Ming added 16 points and 14 rebounds, and the Houston Rockets tied a team record Tuesday with their ninth road victory in a row, 93-85 over the Cleveland Cavaliers.
